p: By the end of February 2020, it was already clear that COVID-19 would also be successfully suppressed in its primary focal point âˆ’ Wuhan. Then, it was also stopped using the first line of defense in another thirty Chinese provinces, all of which are very large population-wise. The surrounding countries in Asia, ie, Japan, Taiwan, South Korea, and Singapore, seemed to control the virus successfully. Then, on the 24 th of February, the first estimates of death rates were published, suggesting that they were much lower than those of SARS and MERS [ 3].
